niagara.physical
Class PhysicalWindowJoin

java.lang.Object
  niagara.optimizer.colombia.Op
      niagara.optimizer.colombia.PhysicalOp
          niagara.physical.PhysicalOperator
              niagara.physical.PhysicalJoin
                  niagara.physical.PhysicalWindowJoin
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Initializable, Instrumentable, Schedulable, SchemaProducer, SerializableToXML
public class PhysicalWindowJoin
extends PhysicalJoin

This is the PhysicalWindowJoinOperator that extends the basic PhysicalOperator with the implementation of the Hash Join operator.

Version:
1.0

initJoin

public void initJoin(Join join)
Specified by:
initJoin in class PhysicalJoin

blockingProcessTuple

protected void blockingProcessTuple(Tuple tupleElement,
                                    int streamId)
                             throws ShutdownException
As we assume linear punctuation on timestamp attribute, we decide whether a input tuple should be stored by the timestamp value of the newest punctuation. In the previous implementation, punctuations are assumed to be on joining attributes.

Overrides:
blockingProcessTuple in class PhysicalOperator
streamId - The source stream from which the tuple was read
Throws:
ShutdownException - Shutdown due to execution error or client request

removeEffectsOfPartialResult

protected void removeEffectsOfPartialResult(int streamId)
This function removes the effects of the partial results in a given source stream. This function over-rides the corresponding function in the base class.

Overrides:
removeEffectsOfPartialResult in class PhysicalOperator
Parameters:
streamId - The id of the source streams the partial result of which are to be removed.

constructJoinResult

private boolean constructJoinResult(Tuple tupleElement,
                                    int streamId,
                                    java.lang.String hashKey,
                                    DuplicateHashtable otherStreamTuples)
                             throws ShutdownException
This function constructs a join result based on joining with tupleElement from the stream with id streamId with the hash table of tuples of the other stream represented by the hash table otherStreamTuples. The join results are returned in result

Parameters:
tupleElement - The tuple to be joined with tuples in other stream
streamId - The stream id of tupleElement
hashCode - The join hash code
otherStreamTuples - The tuples to be joined with tupleElement
Throws:
ShutdownException

processPunctuation

protected void processPunctuation(Punctuation tuple,
                                  int streamId)
                           throws ShutdownException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
The orginal processPunctuation function is temporarily commented out, because it assumes punctuattion on the hashing attributes. Here, we assume linear punctuation on time. But eventually we should handle linear punctuation per group. - Jenny

Overrides:
processPunctuation in class PhysicalOperator
Parameters:
tuple - The current input tuple to examine.
streamId - The id of the source streams the partial result of which are to be removed.
Throws:
ShutdownException
java.lang.InterruptedException

findLocalCost

public Cost findLocalCost(ICatalog catalog,
                          LogicalProperty[] inputLogProp)
Description copied from class: PhysicalOp
Local cost of the operator, including output but not input costs. Thus we compute output costs only once, and get input costs from (as part of) the input operators' cost

Specified by:
findLocalCost in class PhysicalOp
See Also:

flushCurrentResults

protected final void flushCurrentResults(boolean partial)
                                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                         ShutdownException
Description copied from class: PhysicalOperator
Requests that a (blocking) operator flush the current version of its results to the sink. This flush request may be do to a GET_PARTIAL request or due to end of stream.

Overrides:
flushCurrentResults in class PhysicalOperator
Parameters:
partial - true if this is partial result output, false if this is the final result output
Throws:
ShutdownException - query shutdown by user or execution error
java.lang.InterruptedException
